document.full_text: elpida memory inc said on thursday it has developed a 4-gigabit dram chip for smart phones, joining bigger rival samsung electronics as the only producers of the large capacity power-saving memory chip.
document.title: elpida develops new dram for smartphones
lines_and_colors: elpida memory inc said on thursday it has developed a 4-gigabit dram chip for smart phones, joining bigger rival samsung electronics as the only producers of the large capacity power-saving memory chip.
